column4: !help installing Software from Ubuntu DVD (11.04) ;  Softwarecenter can´t find the media....(DVD)    (i guess it is looking at false location"/cdrom" instead looking in "/media"
help!         installing Software from Ubuntu DVD (11.04) ;  Softwarecenter can´t find the media....(DVD)    (i guess it is looking at false location"/cdrom" instead looking in "/media"
ohhh wow...., no thanks.... i am just a stupid user and don´t want to become an expert....
not now, at least... ( maybe in future.)
That is not my fault..., I guess the OS is faulty....
umount the dvd, run "sudo apt-cdrom add" and try again
your dvd/cd doesn't hold a valid repository
looks like a live-cd you have
It is a installable Live-DVD....; it came with easyLinux-magazine, but the author of the magazine said it would be possible to install from DVD....
install from dvd != dvd hold a repo to be used by an existing installation
you might use that dvd to install a fresh system
do you want me to quote the author of the artikel ( easyLinux-magazine) ???
would you be so kind to check this output ? http://paste.ubuntu.com/664897/
did you see my second post ?
Do you have some small time free... ?
